items.name: FXCHOICE_SERVER_PORT
items.description: The port used to listen to the request from Wincor

items.name: REQUEST_DATA_FORMAT
items.description: The request data format for FxChoice Socket Implementation

items.name: RESPONSE_DATA_FORMAT
items.description: The response data format for FxChoice Socket Implementation

items.name: TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 150s or 2 1/2 minutes)

items.name: DCC_TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 62s or 1 minute 2s | 60 CCredit DCC Timeout)

items.name: WINCOR_TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 240s or 4 minutes)

items.name: YN_TIMEOUT
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 60s or 1 minute)

items.name: YN_TIMEOUT_BUFFER
items.description: Timeout in seconds (default is 10s - buffer used while waiting for YNTIMEOUT to expire)

items.name: CONTROLLER_TIMER
items.description: In minutes, how often to ping pos controller

items.name: FILE_SYNCH_TIMER
items.description: In seconds, how often to synchronize files with pos controller

items.name: SIGNPAD_SWEEPER_DURATION
items.description: In months, how long will the log files be kept

items.name: LOG_SWEEPER_TIMER
items.description: In days, how often to check the log files

items.name: LOG_SWEEPER_DURATION
items.description: In months, how long will the log files be kept

items.name: DEFAULT_TERMINAL_NAME
items.description: Mapping for Payment Service via (TerminalConstant) Terminal ImplDefault Mapping for Payment Service via (TerminalConstant) Terminal Impl

items.name: MPOS_TERMINAL_NAME
items.description: Make this terminal multithreaded

items.name: REFUND_RATE_VALIDATION_MARGIN
items.description: 0.5 means bigger or small than 50% of input rate is not valid

items.name: SUSPENDED_CURRENCY_LIST
items.description: format: JPY,USD,EUR...

items.name: MINIMUM_DCC_AMOUNT
items.description: in cents, e.g. 500 means 5 dollar

items.name: MINIMUM_TOTAL_AMOUNT
items.description: minimum amount that will be accepted

items.name: CARD_TYPE_DCC_SPLIT
items.description: TRUE for using different card type output for MasterCard and Visa DCC trnx, FALSE for displaying common output for MasterCard and Visa DCC trnx

items.name: RATE_FORMAT
items.description: TC-BC=division BC-TC=multiply

items.name: APPLICATION_ROOT_PATH
items.description: Application's root path

items.name: FXCHOICE_PATH
items.description: The base directory of FxChoice

items.name: FILE_SYNCH_PATH
items.description: The directory to save the file synchronized with the server

items.name: LOG_PATH
items.description: Log files directory

items.name: REPORT_PATH
items.description: Report files directory

items.name: RESEND_PATH
items.description: Resend files directory

items.name: SIGNATURE_RESEND_PATH
items.description: Signature files Directory

items.name: UPGRADE_PATH
items.description: Upgrade files directory

items.name: SIGNPAD_MONITOR_PATH
items.description: Signpad monitor files directory

items.name: SIGNPAD_PLATFORM_TOOLS_PATH
items.description: Signpad log files directory

items.name: FILE_SYNCH_LIST
items.description: The file list which needs to be synchronized with the server

items.name: DAILY_REPORT
items.description: Daily Summary of Transaction

items.name: SHIFT_REPORT
items.description: Per Shift Summary of transaction

items.name: SHIFT_TRXN_REPORT
items.description: Shift Transaction Details

items.name: CONTROLLER_REQUEST_SERVLET
items.description: The servlet to get command from server

items.name: CONTROLLER_FILE_DEPOSIT_SERVLET
items.description: The servlet to deposit files to server

items.name: CONTROLLER_FILE_DOWNLOAD_SERVLET
items.description: The servlet to get files to server

items.name: FLAG_ENABLE_POSCONTROLLER
items.description: TRUE or FALSE, TRUE = Enable POS Controller else Disabled

items.name: FLAG_ENABLE_TRX_RESEND
items.description: TRUE or FALSE, TRUE = Enable transaction and signature resend else Disabled

items.name: FLAG_SHUTDOWN_APPLICATION
items.description: Triggers auto exit upon POS shutdown request

items.name: TERMINAL_RESEND_TIMES
items.description: Times FxChoice will try to send request to terminal

items.name: TERMINAL_TRANSACTION_DELAY
items.description: In milliseconds, how long to delay before sending succeeding RESPONSE to terminal

items.name: TERMINAL_TRANSACTION_RESP_DELAY
items.description: In milliseconds, how long to delay after receiving RESPONSE from terminal

items.name: TERMINAL_HC_DELAY
items.description: In milliseconds, the delay after a health check is done

items.name: TERMINAL_SPECIAL_TIMEOUTS
items.description: Configuration of special timeouts of requests, the unit here is in seconds

items.name: TERMINAL_DYNAMIC_TIMEOUT
items.description: Configuration for having dynamic timeouts, which carries over the excess timeout to sales

items.name: TERMINAL_MARKUP
items.description: Markup to be passed to the terminal and printed on receipt

items.name: TERMINAL_EPS_MERCHANT_REF_LEN
items.description: 12 or 16 Merchant Ref length to be accepted

items.name: TERMINAL_EPS_SPEC
items.description: EPS Specs V402 or V13

items.name: TERMINAL_EPS_ENABLE_CHIPCARD
items.description: TRUE to always use CHIP in EPS request, else FALSE to use card type mapping to determine CHIP

items.name: TERMINAL_HOST_URL
items.description: Epay host

items.name: TERMINAL_PROCESSOR
items.description: Terminal processor mapping for schemes

items.name: SIGNATURE_IMAGE_UPLOAD_URL
items.description: CHECK to delete

items.name: SIGNATURE_IMAGE_UPLOAD_SERVLET
items.description: CHECK to delete

items.name: SIGNPAD_ON_DEMAND_CONNECTION
items.description: Open/create connection as requested and closes after process is completed

items.name: SIGNPAD_ON_DEMAND_AVAILABILITY
items.description: Flag to indicate if checking of signpad connection availability is needed or not before a certain process

items.name: SIGNPAD_SOCKET_ADB_FORWARD
items.description: Flag to direct all socket connection of signpad to localhost instead of specific IP

items.name: SIGNPAD_DATA_BIT
items.description: DATABITS_5 = 5; DATABITS_6 = 6; DATABITS_7 = 7; DATABITS_8 = 8;

items.name: SIGNPAD_STOP_BIT
items.description: STOPBITS_1 = 1; STOPBITS_2 = 2; STOPBITS_1_5 = 3;

items.name: SIGNPAD_PARITY_BIT
items.description: PARITY_NONE = 0; PARITY_ODD = 1; PARITY_EVEN = 2; PARITY_MARK = 3; PARITY_SPACE = 4;

items.name: SIGNPAD_IP
items.description: IP address of the signpad

items.name: SIGNPAD_PORT
items.description: Port number to connect

items.name: SIGNPAD_ACK_TIMEOUT
items.description: in seconds, how long it expects to receive ACK after sending the request

items.name: SIGNPAD_INIT_RETRY_COUNT
items.description: Retry count for signpad initialization

items.name: SIGNPAD_INIT_DELAY
items.description: In seconds, how long a process can be done with the terminal

items.name: SIGNPAD_ON_DEMAND_TIMEOUT
items.description: In seconds, how long an on-demand form can be done with the terminal

items.name: SHOULD_RESTART_SIGNPAD_FAILURE
items.description: Enable/disable perform recovery | always false for now

items.name: TERMINAL_HEALTH_CHECK_ENABLED
items.description: Enable/disable terminal health checking | always false for now

items.name: SERIAL_HEALTH_CHECK_ENABLED
items.description: Enable/disable device health checking

items.name: TERMINAL_HEALTH_CHECK_FREQUENCY
items.description: How frequent to check the terminal (in seconds)

items.name: SIGNPAD_HEALTH_CHECK_FREQUENCY
items.description: How frequent to check the signpad (in seconds)

items.name: ECR_HEALTH_CHECK_FREQUENCY
items.description: How frequent to check the signpad (in seconds)

items.name: RESTART_WAITING_TIME
items.description: Delay in seconds before triggering a windows restart

items.name: RESTART_INTERVAL_TIME
items.description: Delay in minutes before triggering a windows restart

items.name: ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE
items.description: TRUE for Electronic Signature, False for Manual Signature

items.name: ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE_CAPTURED_NOTE
items.description: Electronic Signature Receipt Captured Note

items.name: HAS_SIGNATURE_HEADER
items.description: TRUE for adding Signature Header, False for no Signature Header

items.name: MANUAL_SIGNATURE_SPACE
items.description: Manual Signature Space

items.name: SIGNATURE_MATCH_QUESTION
items.description: Manual Signature Space

items.name: SIGNATURE_INCLUDED_IN_PRIVATE_DATA
items.description: True to include base64 signatureimage in the private data | else false

items.name: SIGNATURE_RESIZE_ENABLED
items.description: True Signature resize/scale Enabled | else false

items.name: SIGNATURE_RESIZE_PERCENTAGE
items.description: Signature resize/scall percentage | 0.5 = 50%, 0.6 = 60%, 0.7 = 70%, 0.8 = 80%, 0.9 = 90%

items.name: SIGNATURE_CAPTURE_ENABLED
items.description: Signature capture Enabled

items.name: WAIVE_SIGNATURE_ENABLED
items.description: Skip signature for amount less than the configured value (Visa EPS/Mastercard QPS)

items.name: MAGSTRIPE_WAIVE_ENABLED
items.description: Skip signature waive for magstripe

items.name: CARDSCHEME_WAIVE_LIST
items.description: Format CardScheme:Maximum amount to skip:Apply to DCC transaction?

items.name: RESPONSECODE_INCLUDED_IN_OPI_RESPONSE
items.description: True to include terminal response code in the response data | else false

items.name: ENABLE_MULTI_CURRENCY
items.description: Show other foreign currencies aside from the home currency. If disabled, the two currencies (base + home) will be displayed

items.name: MULTI_CURRENCY_LIST
items.description: The list and order of currencies for display. Format -> Currency:Display Order

items.name: SIGNATURE_CAPTURE_ENABLED
items.description: Signaure capture Enabled

items.name: DCC_CONTACTLESS_AMOUNT_LIMIT
items.description: DCC Amount limit for contactless card before requiring signature

items.name: integratedReceiptWidth
items.description: Integer between 28 and 500

items.name: SHOW_CARDBRAND_IN_SIGNPAD
items.description: Show the card schemes in the signpad DCC offer screen. 0-Don't show, 1-Show only with CoBrand, 2-Show including Visa/MC

items.name: ENABLE_DEFAULT_FOR_UNSUPPORTED_CURRENCY
items.description: If the card currency is not supported, should we display a default DCC currency? TRUE - Yes, FALSE - No

items.name: DEFAULT_UNSUPPORTED_CURRENCY_CODE
items.description: Which currency to use as DCC for unsupported currency

items.name: APPLY_DEFAULT_TO_UNSUPPORTED_CURRENCY_ONLY
items.description: Should we restrict showing of default to unsupported currency list. TRUE - Yes, FALSE-No include other scenarios (no rates etc)

items.name: HAS_TXLG
items.description: TRUE for enabling TXLG , False for no TXLG

items.name: CURRENT_TRANSACTION_FILE
items.description: The file name to save information of current transaction

items.name: LAST_TRANSACTION_FILE
items.description: The file name to save information of last transaction

items.name: LAST_TRANSACTION_RECEIPT
items.description: The file name to save information of last transaction

items.name: OPERATOR_SCREEN_DEVICE
items.description: The sequence number of the screen which operator use

items.name: FXDISPLAY_TIMEOUT
items.description: Seconds, how long for a customer to choose use DCC or not

items.name: SIGNATURE_VERIFY_TIMEOUT
items.description: Seconds, how long for a customer to sign on the receipt

items.name: CURRENCY_SELECTION_DISCLAMER
items.value: This rate is based on the Pure Commerce wholesale rate plus 2.75% international conversion margin.

items.name: CURRENCY_SELECTION_OPERATOR_TEXT_1STHALF
items.value: This customer is using a Visa or MasterCard from overseas and can pay in their home currency.| We provide an optional service that lets customers pay in their home currency, the service is called Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC).|| By pressing the home currency button marked with their flag the cardholder can pay in their home currency and lock in the rate & amount shown on the touchscreen.|| Otherwise - the cardholder can press AUD and have the transaction converted at an unknown rate to be later determined by their card issuer.| Here are some of the customer benefits to paying in their home currency with DCC:|| 1. Instant knowledge of the transaction amount in their home currency at the time of sale. No need to wait for a credit card statement or check internet banking| 2. Exchange rates are updated every hour to provide the most accurate rate.| 3. More choice - cardholders can make an informed choice of currency conversion for the purchase. || The rate for this transaction is:|

items.name: DISPLAY_STATUS_POPUP
items.description: TRUE to display Status notification to Operator Screen, else False

items.name: DISPLAY_SIGNATURE_APPROVAL_POPUP
items.description: TRUE to display Status notification to Operator Screen, else False

items.name: DISPLAY_OPERATOR_DCC_CANCEL
items.description: True to display DCC OPERATOR SCREEN, else False

items.name: DCC_PINPAD_DISPLAY
items.description: True to display in PINPAD instead of customer screen, Else False - display in Customer Screen

items.name: DEVICE_REQ_ACTIVE
items.description: True to Enable DeviceRequest to communicate to POS else False -Disabled

items.name: DEVICE_CONN_TIMEOUT
items.description: In milliseconds

items.name: DEVICE_PAYMENT_TYPES
items.description: Payment Type:<True to include else false>:<Erase true or false>:<PaperCut true or false>

items.name: DEVICE_BARCODE_ENTRY_VALUE
items.description: InDeviceTarget value to acquire the barcode. Values can be CashierKeyboard, BarcodeScanner, etc. refer to Wincor Specs v1.3

items.name: DEVICE_REQ_SIGNATURE_VERIFICATION_SCREEN
items.description: TRUE for POS Signature Verification, False to disable

items.name: DEVICE_REQ_BARCODE_TRIGGER_SCREEN
items.description: TRUE for POS Barcode trigger request, False to disable

items.name: DEVICE_REQ_SEND_MERCHANT_RECEIPT
items.description: TRUE for POS Sending Merchant receipt, False to disable

items.name: DEVICE_REQ_SEND_CUSTOMER_RECEIPT
items.description: TRUE for POS Sending Customer receipt, False to disable

items.name: DEVICE_REQ_CARDNUMBER_TRIGGER_SCREEN
items.description: TRUE for POS CardNumber trigger request, False to disable

items.name: DEVICE_REQ_CARDNUMBER_ALLOWED_ALL_REQUEST_TYPE
items.description: TRUE for to allow card number trigger for all request type, False to for card payment only

items.name: EPAY_DIGITALPAY_SIMULATOR_MODE
items.description: EPay simulator mode: set to FALSE if need to connect to TEST or PROD host, otherwise TRUE
